Projects

A Fake News Detector App

This machine learning project involved collecting, cleaning and preprocessing a dataset with news articles and labels -Spam and Not Spam, the next process was spliting the data into train and test sets and then training the set on a classification algorithm, finally i tested the model on the test set and recorded the accuracy, once the results were within the agreed error rate after multiple iterations, i deployed the model using Streamlit

An Exploratory Data Analysis App

This app reads data from a CSV file and instantly generates scatterplots, histograms and barplots of user defined variables without the user having to write any code. The app will generate summaries and overall statistical descriptions about a dataset insatntly by uploading a CSV file!

An E-commerce Web Scrapper

This web scrapper is an automated Python scripts that crawls e-commerce platforms like Ebay and Amazon and parses the raw html using BeautifulSoup library to represent the data in a desired format. The data can be read to a database or parsed in a Json format

Let's build something fun and useful together
